data.text: Fomɨra Atrivim Jotam ko, Atrivim Ahas ko, Atrivim Hesekia me vaghvagha Judan gumazamizibagh ativagha men atrivibar ikezir dughiabar, Ikiavɨra Itir God mɨgɨrɨgɨar kam isa Maika ganɨngi, Maika a Moresetɨn nguibamɨn gumazir mam. Ikiavɨra Itir God Samarian nguibar ekiam ko, Jerusalemɨn nguibar ekiamɨn otivamin bizibar gun Maika mɨgei.
Ia kantriba bar dar gumazamiziba, ia deraghvɨra akar kam baragh!
Ia gan! Ikiavɨra Itir God uan Nguibar Aghuim ategh izasa.
Eghtɨ mɨghsɨaba an suemningɨn apengan dɨpabar mɨn otivigham,
Israelia, me Godɨn akam batuegha arazir kuram gami,
Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Ikiavɨra Itir God ghaze,
Eghtɨ kɨ asebar marvir guaba abɨghɨrarigh, da isɨ avimɨn da kunigham.
Getɨn nguibamɨn itir gumazamiziba, me en apaniba, ezɨ ia kamaghɨn me mɨkɨman markɨ,
Ia Safirɨn nguibamɨn gumazamiziba, ia bibiabara ikɨva aghumsɨgh,
Ikiavɨra Itir God Jerusalem gasɨghasɨghamin dughiam bar roghɨra ize,
Ia Lakisɨn nguibamɨn adarasi, ia Israelian arazir kurabar gɨn ghua,
Ia Judaba, ia Moreset Getɨn nguibamɨn apangkufigh.
Ezɨ ia Maresan nguibamɨn adarasi, Ikiavɨra Itir God,
Egh apanir kaba ian borir ia bar ifongeziba inigh mangegham.
